8538.name: BCG immunization coverage among 1-year-olds (WHO 2017)
8538.description:
Percentage of one-year-olds who have received one dose of Bacillus Calmette-Guérin (BCG) vaccine in a given year. BCG vaccine protects against Tuberculosis. 
Data sources: Household surveys
8538.coverage: Global by country and world region
8538.datasetName: Vaccine Coverage and Disease Burden - WHO (2017)
